title: Golden Spike National Historic Site: News
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     News             News        Keep Informed Golden Spike National Historic Site has several options for the public to find information on the upcoming events and conditions within the Site. Exploring our website, checking current weather and fire conditions, as well as checking the latest news releases are a few options to stay connected with the information relevant to the Site.  News Releases View our News Releases to learn more about the events and decisions that are being made in connection to Golden Spike National Historic Site. You can also search through the archives to learn more about past events and news. Contact our Staff For more information, please contact the Golden Spike National Historic Site Visitor Center between 9:00 Am and 5:00 PM at 435-471-2209 x29 or by e-mail at gosp_interpretation@nps.gov .
